title: The High Harper
tags: how to unlock the high harper
content: ity's guildmaster, Nine-Fingers Keene, he teleported away. We should search the vault for clues as to where he went. We saw Minsc rob the vault beneath the Counting House, led by a doppelganger wearing Jaheira's face. He escaped Nine-Fingers' trap and teleported away - we should search the vault for clues on where he went. The lower levels of the Counting House are off-limits to the public. We need a vault pass from Head Clerk Meadhoney to enter. Head Clerk Meadhoney revealed that a 'Stone Lord'
